description: Compatible with Microsoft XP, Vista, 7 and 8. PERIMICE-710 is a wireless mouse for laptop users. Its wireless connection can provide the operating range up to 30 feet distance. title: Perixx PERIMICE-710R, Wireless Mouse for Laptop - Red - 2.4G - Up to 30 Ft Operating Range - 1000/1600 DPI Optical Resolution - Nano Receiver - On/Off Switch - Elegant Rubber Painting - Energizer Batteries Included
